title: The Cooperation Agreement between the Sri Lanka Export Development Board and the International Finance Corporation (IFC) to facilitate Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) to become Exporters
decision_details: - It has been proposed to sign a Cooperation Agreement between the International Finance Corporation and the Sri Lanka Export Development Board in order to facilitate the development of new exporters under the New Exporter Development Programme of the Sri Lanka Export Development Board aiming to upgrade the Small and Medium Exporters with export potentiality to the status of  Exporters. The clearance of the Attorney General and the recommendations of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs have been received for the said Cooperation Agreement. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as Minister of Investment Promotion to sign the proposed Cooperation Agreement between the two parties, was approved by the Cabinet.
